message: The QUALITY_ASSURE field for indicator 14-3-1, translated into en
data: The data collected and analyzed, results of the expeditions made at the technical level are in turn submitted to members of the Technical Council composed of specialists in the area of acidification of the oceans for analysis and comparability with the different results of the expeditions with the countries of the region and or worldwide, in order to ensure the sustainable management of marine ecosystems on the pH of the ocean.
